attributes.action: Investigate misconduct & disregard for passengers in Ryanair's cancellations
attributes.background: Ryanair should not be allowed to leave passengers with uncertainty and worry about their travel by refusing to publish a list of the flights they intend to cancel in the next 6 weeks. Customers are being left anxious about their plans and finances & Ryanair are still selling flights they may cancel

rejection.details:
Airlines are regulated by the Civil Aviation Authority, which is independent.

You can find out how to make a complaint here:

https://www.caa.co.uk/Passengers/Resolving-travel-problems/How-the-CAA-can-help/How-to-make-a-complaint/
